scripts.entry:dev: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.dev -- nx run entry:dev
scripts.api:dev: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.dev -- nx run entry:dev
scripts.test: CI=true NX_TERMINAL_OUTPUT=static NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- nx run-many -t test --projects="modules/*/__testing__"
scripts.test:watch: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- nx run-many -t test:watch --projects="modules/*/module"
scripts.db:migrate: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.dev -- bun run --filter=@template/db migrate
scripts.db:migrate:test: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- bun run --filter=@template/db migrate
scripts.db:generate: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false bun run --filter=@template/db generate && bun run --filter=@template/prisma-defs transform
scripts.db:reset:test: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- bun run --filter=@template/db reset
scripts.db:dev: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.dev -- bun run --filter=@template/db prisma
scripts.db:test: NX_LOAD_DOT_ENV_FILES=false dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- bun run --filter=@template/db prisma
scripts.ensure-prisma: bun run db:generate:prod && bun run --filter=@template/prisma-defs transform
scripts.ensure-prisma-ci: bun run db:generate:prod && bun run --filter=@template/prisma-defs transform
scripts.hide:env: bun dotenvx encrypt -f .env.dev && bun dotenvx encrypt -f .env.test
scripts.show:env: bun dotenvx decrypt -f .env.dev && bun dotenvx decrypt -f .env.test
